mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_POST.BP_ID, BOARD_POST.EMP_ID, BOARD_POST.BP_MOD_ID, BOARD_POST.BRD_ID, BOARD_POST.BP_TITLE, BOARD_POST.BP_CN, BOARD_POST.BP_REG_DT, BOARD_POST.BP_DEL_DT, BOARD_POST.BP_OP_YN, BOARD_POST.BP_CNT, BOARD_POST.BP_MOD_DT, BOARD_POST.BP_SHR_YN, BOARD_POST.BP_NTC_ID, BOARD_POST.BP_QNA_AS, EMP.EMP_NAME FROM BOARD_POST INNER JOIN EMP ON (BOARD_POST.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID) WHERE BOARD_POST.BRD_ID = 'BN0002' AND BOARD_POST.BP_ID = #{bpId}

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_POST.BP_ID, BOARD_POST.EMP_ID, BOARD_POST.BP_MOD_ID, BOARD_POST.BRD_ID, BOARD_POST.BP_TITLE, BOARD_POST.BP_CN, BOARD_POST.BP_REG_DT, BOARD_POST.BP_DEL_DT, BOARD_POST.BP_OP_YN, BOARD_POST.BP_CNT, BOARD_POST.BP_MOD_DT, BOARD_POST.BP_SHR_YN, BOARD_POST.BP_NTC_ID, BOARD_POST.BP_QNA_AS, EMP.EMP_NAME FROM BOARD_POST INNER JOIN EMP ON (BOARD_POST.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID) WHERE BOARD_POST.BRD_ID = 'BN0002' ) A ) B
WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
